title: How to Make Sake Maki in Dreamlight Valley

steps.title: Sake Maki requires three ingredients.
steps.content: Sake Maki requires three ingredients. To make Sake Maki in Dreamlight Valley, you need 1 Salmon , 1 Seaweed , and 1 Rice . To cook anything in Dreamlight Valley, you will need a piece of Coal as well.

steps.title: Fish for Salmon in the Sunlit Plateau or Frosted Heights.
steps.content: Fish for Salmon in the Sunlit Plateau or Frosted Heights. Go fishing in one of these two regions, and you will likely catch a Salmon.

steps.title: Find Seaweed by fishing without targeting fish.
steps.content: Find Seaweed by fishing without targeting fish. When you go fishing in Dreamlight Valley, you are likely to target the circular ripples in a body of water, which indicate that fish are nearby. To find Seaweed, simply cast your line into a body of water where you do not see these ripples. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Purchase Rice from Goofy's Stall in the Glade of Trust region.
steps.content: Purchase Rice from Goofy's Stall in the Glade of Trust region. This area cannot be unlocked until you have spent at least 5,000 Dreamlight to clear the Giant Night Thorns. Goofy has other Stalls throughout Dreamlight Valley, but only this one offers Rice.

steps.title: Purchase Coal from Kristoff's Stall, or mine for it yourself.
steps.content: Purchase Coal from Kristoff's Stall, or mine for it yourself. You can mine for Coal Ore from any rock spot in Dreamlight Valley, but the most reliable way to find Coal is to buy as much as possible from Kristoff's Stall. If you opt to mine for Coal, consider bringing a companion who specializes in Coal.

steps.title: Visit a stovetop.
steps.content: Visit a stovetop. You can cook your Sake Maki on any stovetop, even if it does not belong to you. For example, you can visit the kitchen in Mickey's home or Remy's restaurant.

steps.title: Select the Sake Maki recipe.
steps.content: Select the Sake Maki recipe. When you interact with a stovetop, Dreamlight Valley will display a menu of all unlocked recipes. Find the Sake Maki recipe. Then, either manually select the ingredients or allow the game to autofill your pot. Congratulations, you have made your very own Sake Maki!
